hotels.title: Colombo Five-Star Oceanside Shangri-La Stay with Direct One Galle Face Mall Access
hotels.description: Make your way to Sri Lanka's enchanting capital and indulge in a well-deserved stay at Shangri-La Colombo, located mere steps from Galle Face Beach. Discover a world of luxury retail at your fingertips thanks to direct access to Shangri-La’s own One Galle Face Mall - home to over 200 retail outlets including restaurants and bars along with a host of local and international brands - along with signature Shangri-La facilities onsite. Head to the world-renowned Chi, The Spa for a selection of indulgent treatments, or drop into the 24-hour Health Club and plunge into the expansive pool. Gourmands will love the extensive range of dining options onsite, including Shang Palace, Central, Capital Bar & Grill, Sapphyr Lounge, Cake Temptations by Shangri-La Colombo or visit the exclusive Horizon Club Lounge. Beyond the hotel awaits a range of sights to explore, including the National Museum, Galle Face Green, Viharamahadevi Park and the Jami-Ul-Alfar Mosque.
